extension.name: Vertical scrolling images
extension.author: Gopi.R
extension.description: Vertical scrolling images will create the vertical scroll slideshow on the website. Images will scroll like reel from bottom to top.

field.name: type
field.label: Image type
field.description: Type of image PNG/GIF/JPG etc. (the default is JPG).

field.name: folder
field.label: Image folder
field.description: Path to the image folder relative to the site URL (e.g. modules/mod_vertical_scrolling_images/images).

field.name: link
field.label: Link
field.description: A URL to redirect to if the image is clicked upon. (e.g. http://www.gopiplus.com)

field.name: scrollercount
field.label: Display no of images
field.description: Display no of images at the same time in the scroller. (e.g. 3)

field.name: height
field.label: Height (px)
field.description: Each image height in the scroller. (e.g. 80)
